name: DailyBoost
0:
”Alexa open daily boost”
”Alexa, ask daily boost for today's boost”
”Alexa, ask daily boost to give me today's boost”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily boost
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Daily Boost is the perfect antidote to trying times. Every day Daily Boost greets you with a fully human-voiced thought to boost your day, chosen just for you. Return as many times as you like to hear today's boost, and return at the start of a new day to receive your new thought for the day.

You can start each day right by adding Daily Boost to a morning routine using the Alexa App. Give yourself the kindness you deserve with a little boost!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
